predicate.note: Frames file for 'ejaculate' based on sentences in BROWN corpus. No VN entry,

example.name: transitive
example.text: When Johnson ejaculated `` Howsabout my buying us all a nice cold Co-cola , Ma'am '' ? ? [*T*-3] Mrs. Roebuck smilingly declined and began suddenly [*-2] to go on about her son , who [*T*-1] was `` onleh a little younguh than you bawhs '' .
example.arg: `` Howsabout my buying us all a nice cold Co-cola , Ma'am '' ? ?
